items.sentence: Tom said he needed to spend a few weeks in Boston.
Tom is so intelligent that he stands out in class.
Tom is still sitting in his car, waiting for Mary.
Tom is still waiting for Mary to make up her mind.
Tom is taller than anybody else in his department.
I didn\'t know you were such superstitious people.
I didn\'t know your grandchildren lived in Boston.
I didn\'t want to watch a movie, so I read a book.
I don\'t believe Tom would do something like that.
I don\'t know anyone who matches that description.
